_source.name: S2E4 Country Girls
_source.shortDescription: LEGO Friends video - The Power of Friendship - Season 2 Episode 4 Country Girls
_source.title: S2E4. Country Girls

characters.description:
Andrea is a natural performer and she WILL become a star! On and off the stage, she’ll act, sing, entertain and dance her way through life. But don’t let all the drama fool you – she knows she needs to work hard to perfect her musical talent (also because Mia kindly reminds her). She’s not afraid of hard work as such, but it IS nice when you can reward yourself with new costumes or a beauty treatment after!

Loves: singing, having FUN, using her talent to make a difference in the world, feeling spoiled.

Not so crazy about: Being told “no”, horseback riding, listening to others talking for too long.
characters.name: Andrea
characters.title: Andrea

characters.description:
Emma is an artist. She can’t go anywhere without drawing, painting or taking pictures of all the beautiful things she sees. She has the quirkiest brain: she can imagine and create things no one else can. She loves telling jokes, even if no one else gets them. She really wants to keep secrets but it’s just SO HARD! She trusts in the best in everyone, even if they don’t always deserve it.

Loves: Art, drawing, having fun, seeing the world through crazy, homemade glasses, starting new creative projects.

Not so crazy about: finishing creative projects, deciding which idea to go with or keeping track of time.
characters.name: Emma
characters.title: Emma

characters.description:
Mia is an adventurer who loves animals and being outdoors. In fact, she’s pretty sure her horse Bella understands her better than most people. She gets things done, and often while her four best friends are still discussing how to do it! She knows who she is and never worries much about what other people think of her. She doesn’t like gossip or small talk. Just be honest with her, she’ll see right through anyone who isn’t! And she’s not afraid to let them know.

Loves: skateboarding, animals, nature, honesty, alone time.

Not so crazy about: long discussions, people who tell her something is impossible.
characters.name: Mia
characters.title: Mia

characters.description:
Olivia loves everything that has to do with coding, gadgets, inventions, engineering and mechanics. She’s a bit of a “Mad Scientist”, but she only uses her powers for good. Need to get out of a tight spot? She’ll create a device or robot to fix it. Her online networks help her with her experiments, but she loves that her real life friends can lure her out of the lab, too. Sometimes you just have to dance crazy with your BFFs.

Loves: SCIENCE Using everyday things for new inventions, learning everything about everything.

Not so crazy about: people who don’t think before they act, or don’t understand why she used THEIR things to build a new invention…
characters.name: Olivia
characters.title: Olivia

characters.description:
Stephanie is an amazing swimmer and lifeguard. Health and sports are her passion. She loves being around her four BFFs, organizing their daily events, nurturing any hurt feelings and coaching them toward victory. She sets high standards for herself. She loves helping others, but she sometimes freaks out when she feels like it’s all down to her.

Loves: planning new missions, going on rescue missions, secret missions, helping others be the best they can be.

Not so crazy about: being alone, risk of failing at something, improvising.
characters.name: Stephanie
characters.title: Stephanie

_source.description: What does the perfect LEGO Friends go-kart look like? Our two builders, Apheni and Grace, are ready to put their creativity to the test and give us their versions of the coolest race cars. The team will have just TWO minutes to help each other customize and personalize their go-karts, and get ready to race and play with all of their hearts!
_source.name: LL_Friends_Video_HeartlakeRacingChallenge_US_Aug18
_source.title: LEGO® Friends The Ultimate Heartlake Racing Challenge!

trackingData.name: LEGO® Friends The Ultimate Heartlake Racing Challenge!

_source.description: From paint tubes to go-kart blueprints, Emma turns everything she touches into shining works of art. She’s not afraid to get her hands dirty while she works. Elbow grease should be part of every artist’s toolbox! Because go-karts can’t win a race on looks alone. Even if the design is perfect, you still need a team of star drivers who are willing to work hard together to race them to victory. Leave it to Emma and her custom go-kart to find creative new ways to help her team of Friends win this race! She knows just how to give the audience at the Heartlake City go-kart championship an artistic show of racing power.
_source.name: Artsy Emma - LEGO Friends Character Spot
_source.shortDescription: Meet Artsy Emma! – LEGO® Friends Videos and Webisodes – LEGO.com
_source.title: Artsy Emma! – LEGO® Friends Character Spot

characters.title: Emma

trackingData.name: Artsy Emma! – LEGO® Friends Character Spot

_source.description: If you blink, you might miss Andrea as she zoom-zooms past you in her cool, customized go-kart with her favorite hits blasting from the giant speakers! An entertainer at heart, Andrea feels right at home on the Heartlake City go-kart race track. She knows how to keep the crowd entertained and she is determined to give them the best show ever and let her music drown out the engine noise! And is there any better way to motivate her Friends to work as a team than with a catchy team song? Watch out for Andrea at the finish line!
_source.name: Meet the music loving Andrea - LEGO Friends Character Spot
_source.shortDescription: Meet Musical Andrea! – LEGO® Friends Videos and Webisodes – LEGO.com
_source.title: Meet music-loving Andrea! – LEGO® Friends Character Spot

trackingData.name: Meet music-loving Andrea! – LEGO® Friends Character Spot

_source.description: While admiring the nature in Heartlake City Park, LEGO® Friends Mia and her brother pass a tree that would make the perfect place for a tree house for her and her friends. With Mia’s imagination and creativity, the possibilities are endless when it comes to building. But what’s this?! A big angry bird is scaring a baby robin? What can Mia and her brother do to help the baby bird? It’s loads of fun with LEGO bricks as Mia and her brother solve this latest mission challenge.
_source.name: Mia Builds a Treehouse Heartlake City Missions
_source.shortDescription: Mia from LEGO® Friends discovers a tree in Heartlake City Park that would make the perfect treehouse for her and her friends to plan their missions. But first she must deal with a big angry bird who is bullying a young robin!
_source.title: Mia Builds a Treehouse – Heartlake City Missions

_source.description: Stephanie arrives at soccer practice and starts her routine: a nice drink of water from the cooler, check if the strategy board is in order – and it’s time to get the football launcher in gear! But something is missing. Her mission: build a soccer goal! And, of course, no practice goal is complete without a moving goalkeeper platform!
_source.name: Stephanies Soccer Practice 41330
_source.shortDescription: Stephanie’s Soccer Practice 41330 – LEGO® Friends – Product animation
_source.title: Stephanie’s Soccer Practice 41330 – LEGO® Friends – Product animation

trackingData.name: Stephanie’s Soccer Practice 41330 – LEGO® Friends – Product animation

set.description: Keep training with Stephanie at her Soccer Practice in Heartlake City Park, and you’ll soon have the best aim in all of Heartlake! Use the shoot function to launch the ball toward the goal and then move Stephanie’s platform from side to side to help her make an acrobatic save. You can play on your own or with a friend! Help puppy Dash fetch the ball, then take a break with a drink and hot dog while checking out the strategy board.

image.alt: LEGO Friends Stephanie's Soccer Practice - 41330 - Train with Stephanie at her Football Practice in Heartlake City Park and use the shoot function to launch the ball toward the goal. Help puppy Dash fetch the ball!

thumbnail.alt: LEGO Friends Stephanie's Soccer Practice - 41330 - Train with Stephanie at her Football Practice in Heartlake City Park and use the shoot function to launch the ball toward the goal. Help puppy Dash fetch the ball!

set.name: 41330 Stephanies Soccer Practice
set.title: Stephanie's Soccer Practice

_source.description: Andrea, Mia, Emma, Olivia, and Stephanie have given the old, abandoned fire station a gigantic makeover! Now it serves as their Heartlake City headquarters. They can plan missions on their secret mission board. Their first mission: bring a little more heart into the world! Like fixing other people’s bikes and things in the garage, taking care of lost pets, cooking a meal for someone who needs it, or just saving Heartlake City!
_source.name: Friendship House 41340
_source.shortDescription: Friendship House 41340 – LEGO® Friends – Product animation
_source.title: Friendship House 41340 – LEGO® Friends – Product animation

trackingData.name: Friendship House 41340 – LEGO® Friends – Product animation

set.description: The girls from Heartlake City have taken over the old fire station and turned it into the ultimate LEGO® Friends headquarters! Relax in the rooftop hot tub, get creative in Emma’s craft room or enjoy Andrea’s performance terrace. There goes the old fire alarm—the girls have a new mission! Make popcorn in the kitchen and spin the bedroom TV to reveal the secret mission screen. Once briefed, slide down the fireman's pole and speed off on Olivia's bike!

image.alt: LEGO Friends Friendship House - 41340 - The old fire station have been turned it into the ultimate LEGO® Friends headquarters. Relax in the rooftop hot tub, get creative in Emma’s craft room or enjoy Andrea’s performance terrace. Make popcorn in the kitchen and spin the bedroom TV to reveal the secret mission screen. Once briefed, slide down the fireman's pole and speed off on Olivia's bike!

thumbnail.alt: LEGO Friends Friendship House - 41340 - The old fire station have been turned it into the ultimate LEGO® Friends headquarters. Relax in the rooftop hot tub, get creative in Emma’s craft room or enjoy Andrea’s performance terrace. Make popcorn in the kitchen and spin the bedroom TV to reveal the secret mission screen. Once briefed, slide down the fireman's pole and speed off on Olivia's bike!

set.name: 41340 Friendship House
set.title: Friendship House

_source.description:
What is more fun than splashing around with your friends in a pool, when it’s summer and hot? Andrea and Martina certainly love it, and play around the Heartlake Summer Pool every summer! 

Who is a real daredevil and dare to jump into the water from the springboard? Who can make a big splash? Or even go down the water slide? 

After a long super fun splashing day with your friends, nothing is better than to enjoy the sunset in the jacuzzi.
_source.name: 41313 Andrea Pool
_source.shortDescription: 41313 – Heartlake Summer Pool – Products – Friends LEGO.com
_source.title: 41313 – Heartlake Summer Pool

set.description: Make a splash with Andrea and Martina as they whizz down the slide and into the pool! Spring off the diving board, practice some lengths and then head over to the swim-up bar for a cold drink. Chill out in the hot tub and relax with a newspaper on the day bed. Freshen up in the restroom, or take a refreshing shower behind the aquarium. This is where the Heartlake City friends come to have fun in the sun!

image.alt: LEGO Friends - 41313 Heartlake Summer Pool - Andrea relaxes in the pool and Martina takes a ride on the water slide and splashes into the pool.

thumbnail.alt: LEGO Friends - 41313 Heartlake Summer Pool - Andrea relaxes in the pool and Martina takes a ride on the water slide and splashes into the pool.

set.name: 41313 Heartlake Summer Pool
set.title: Heartlake Summer Pool
